ca.utoronto.utm.othello.model

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.utoronto.utm.othello.model.Point

  • public class Point
extends java.lang.Object
    A class designed to run static operations on integer arrays of length 2, in Base 10. Geometrically, this class can be seen as managing operations on points in an R^2 space. This class is meant to be called Statically, and not instantiated.
    Author:
    Emily Wu
